metadata.description: With over 12 years of experience in the barber trade, Koppel Barbershop is the place for men seeking style and quality.
metadata.keywords: Koppel Barbershop, haircut, stylen, shave, men, gentlemen, Amersfoort

intro.title: Welcome to Koppel Barbershop
intro.body: With over 12 years of experience in the barber trade, Koppel Barbershop is the place for men seeking style and quality. Since its opening in 2020 in Amersfoort, Isa has created a space where every customer feels welcome and appreciated. At Koppel Barbershop, not only is excellent hair, beard and clean shave care provided, but also a unique experience in which your wishes are the focus. Isa specializes in various styles such as Western and Azian hair and enjoys collaborating with you to create your personal look. Stop by and experience the atmosphere of Koppel Barbershop â€“ where craftsmanship and a personal touch come together.

prices.title: Prices and treatments
prices.headShaveAndBeardTrimWithShave: Head shave & Beard trim WITH shave
prices.headShaveAndBeardTrimWithoutShave: Head shave & Beard trim WITHOUT shave

location.title: You can find us here
location.body: The closest available parking is Koestraat parking garage, though it is often busy on thursday, friday and saturday.

notifications.startOf2024:
Dear customers,

2024 has started which means we have a great new year ahead of us including some anncouncements
Isa her recovery is going well but she will need to take some more rest than she did so far. Her agenda will have limited time slots until she has fully recovered. Make sure to book your appointment on time because of the limited available slots!

Sadly we also have to raise our pices for the coming year. Some of the treatments have remained the same and some are raised in price. Starting Thursday February 1st the new pricelist will go in effect. Besides the new prices there are also some new treatments to better serve you as our customer.

See you soon in one of our chairs, Love!

Isa
